short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: For NFL Game Pass International - removes the progress bar and remaining time from game replays for spoiler-free suspense!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
For NFL Game Pass International.

This extension allows you to remove the remaining time indicator from the video player, letting you watch the games spoiler free. 

Keep the suspense of not knowing if a game went to overtime or was over quickly!

The extension can be enabled and disabled by clicking the icon in the menu bar.

Note: this extension is unofficial, and has no association with the NFL.
